page.title: 03POLICE/LAW AND ORDER
page.content: Policemen can be kind and helpful or strict and firm. They can tell you the way to certain places but if you are a criminal they can be very tough. They wear black uniforms to stand out in day and to be dark if you creep about at night. If they do not want to be seen by day, they stand in the shadows.They make anyone who goes over the speed limit in their cars go to court. Policemen also help control the traffic. The policeman's most important job is to catch criminals, such as burglars, shoplifters or even murderers.They look for evidence like fingerprints, weapons and tyremarks.You get a policeman if you dial 999 on the telephone.The city's policemen work in shifts.
